title: Devcon #5 - Aya Miyaguchi | The Heart of Ethereum
itunes:title: Devcon #5 - Aya Miyaguchi | The Heart of Ethereum
description:
Welcome to Devcon 6. The first Devcon for Bankless, the conference was a ton of fun and an amazing cultural experience in Bogota, Colombia.

Aya Miyaguchi is the executive director of the Ethereum Foundation. She is one of the leaders of Devcon, powering the cultural experience of this monumental conference.
